name: antsama
text: Haha, television prop hella-coptor with it's fake accessories.

name: gelter
text: Personally, I like to think that Ray made the headset himself. He wouldn't let himself fly Airwolf without looking the part.

name: dougthehead
text: A comment left by dougthehead was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by sirhan_duran, geesycreesy, Jesler729, DomainAvailable, HolyQ, michellemarie, Johnfen, fakedaisies, aHatOfPig, Pigs)

name: cuddlefish
text: heeeela copter

name: stuart
text: Banjo-Kazooie: Nuts and Bolts is a great game.

name: jeannetteandre
text: alt text "Jakob Nielsen could have prevented this."

name: peterjoel
text: Jakob Nielsen would have a problem with the image alt text not being an actual alternative to the image itself.

name: 1000hz
text: Man, when this strip first aired I was like NOOOOOO RAY JUST KILLED PHILIIIIIIPPE!! all horrified...

name: _cheesekayke
text: That is a silly reaction to death. Clearly, if Philippe had died, it would only be a temporary hiatus and an excellent opportunity to meet chicks and blues singers.

name: squi
text: Blues singers are in hell to where the young otter is not destined. And heaven burned down, leaving just Trouble Man and No No. The afterlife would be grim for Philippe.

name: ford
text: i got the idea that the only part of heaven that burned was the apartment building containing molly.

name: i_love_kate
text: Then why did all souls burn?

name: apocowarg
text: All the souls in that apartment building.

name: carlyle
text: That's decidedly less dramatic.

name: unsentletter
text: But no rollerskate harbringer...

name: stuart
text: Well, the title of this strip is "Ray Kills Phillipe".

name: geesycreesy
text: I like the idea that a lucky bad-ass (who has torn another cat's face off in the GOF) such as Ray can still go into catatonic shock when he thinks he's done something terrible.

name: i_love_kate
text: Except his reaction was equally violent in that instance, too.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: huh-huh. He said catatonic.

name: nice-on-water
text: I think he could not have reacted this way to anyone else's death but Philippe's.  They all just love that little guy.

name: jesler729
text: Huh.. Teodor doesn't seem all that upset.

name: connellingus
text: There goes a special boy.

name: gmm
text: This here comment is straight up genius.

name: mugi
text: Seconded.

name: mr_lostman28
text: If those are really just styrofoam cups then what is ray using here ?

name: twohundredninety
text: Styrofoam cups.

name: jesler729
text: I like to think that Ray made them.

name: iidebaser
text: the headphones aren't anywhere near ray's ears anyway. very mysterious .

name: lrosetw8
text: "Pouf" has become an onomatopoeia that I will always associate with badassery in Achewood, starting when Beef got off his bike before the GOF.

name: cameasiam
text: It is French for "Poof"

name: mattfish
text: was it first in "until you are SO nude" or was that "puf"

name: stuart
text:
1. Styrofoam spray-paints like a bitch , FYI. I don't recommend it.
2. This is the most sublime strip I have fived.

name: ricnine
text: I love how Ray instantly goes catatonic. Doesn't even flop over or anything, until Teodor pushes him. Just freezes. Classic.

name: stoned_lightning
text: and the subtle difference in the horrified expression between paneks 7 and 8. Classic.

name: i_love_kate
text: There is no difference. What'choo talkin' 'bout?

name: pez
text: i dont see that, but i do see the change in panels 4 and seven. at first its shock, then ray's lower lip curls in horror

name: cbtbone
text: it's subtle but by jove I think you're right!

name: spicyponyhead
text: Contrast this with Roast Beef, who goes catatonic when he steps in dogshit.

name: i_love_kate
text: The alt text seriously made me think that Phillipe was dead.

name: macdaddyw
text: I'm listening to In the Summertime. Idk why but it makes this comic way funnier. Perhaps I'm just weird like that.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: ...i can honestly see why that would be funny.

name: woodenteeth
text: Not unlike listening to Yesterday as some dudes put dynamite under an elephant.

name: johnnyrocker
text: Teodor is like the closest thing to a regular guy in all of Achewood.

name: cherubrocker22
text: Ray can't bear the thought that he hurt his favorite kid.

name: hamscout
text:
Another near-death experience-
courtesy of: Coors!

name: woodenteeth
text: all "Come into the light!" and you walk toward it and there's girls in bikinis bouncing up and down, and there's a pool and you're fit and tanned and your spraying people with a shaken up can of Coors and all of a sudden God is chuggin with ya and you're all more like a near-AWESOME experience!

name: autrepoupee
text:
When I first read this one, I didn't get that Ray had gone catatonic. I thought the big reveal here was that Airwolf was just a prop helicopter, with fake headphones and a fake Ray as the pilot.

It was a totally different strip.

name: gigs
text: Oh thank god I wasn't the only one. I had no fucking clue what I just saw. Kinda detracted from the 'oh holy shit did ray just kill phillipe' part of the strip.

name: tonyhighwind
text: Ray Smuckles cares about the children.

name: rowan
text: I still kinda wish that Phillipe had died
